message: This group is all about Apple's iOS (iPhone, iPad, iPod) and The iPhone Podcast. If you aren't familiar with the show check out theiphonepodcast.com. Feedback is always welcome and appreciated.
Nice. At least I convinced one person to use it.
+1 just listened to your podcast and decided to DL. I hope this picks up traction.
@JNGold Thanks for listening and trying this out. I have a lot of great promo codes to giveaway so at least you'll get some free apps if it doesn't take off.
One more, I love the show and listen to it every week. I love this app and hope it takes off. Thanks for the recommendation.
@Lyle Thanks so much. I'm not sure this is the next Facebook, but I think it has a chance to succeed.
I hope so as I like having the opportunity to learn and share at the same time.
@marle No matter what happens I'll be here. I look forward to asking and answering questions, and sharing apps.
Getting views and answers that aren't tied down to who you've "added" opens up so many more possibilities.

@Lyle I agree. That is the big problem with Twitter. If you have very few followers, there is no discussion. If you have too many it's overwhelming. Something like this allows people with the same interests to interact.
@justinluey how do wd change this default monkey picture?
@shahabmirzaei I think you have to it on Convore.com I don't think you can do it on the app.
@shahabmirzaei then u can sync with Facebook and it will use your profile pic
